upstream_source_type.description: The type of the upstream source.

upstream_source_id.description: Unique identifier for the upstream source.

depth.description: The level of depth in the source hierarchy.

type.description: The type of the object in the source hierarchy (e.g., database, table, column).

label.description: The label or name of the object in the source hierarchy.

upstream_source_value.description: A list detailing the hierarchy of the source from the highest level to the lowest.
